p: Despite factors specific to host and viral genomes, several other factors can have contributed to the unforeseen scale of ZIKV neurological damage seen in recent years. An interesting study in immunodeficient mice has suggested that sexual transmission of ZIKV favors congenital infection and the development of malformations of fetuses, suggesting that the route of infection may also play a role in the severity of congenital ZIKV syndrome [ 73].
